name: Apple iPhone 14 Pro Max
description: The iPhone 14 Pro Max features a 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display, A16 Bionic chip, and an advanced 48MP triple-camera system. Supports 5G and Face ID.

name: Nike Air Max 270
description: Experience all-day comfort with Nike's Air Max 270 sneakers, featuring a bold design and responsive cushioning for athletic and casual wear.

name: Samsung 55-inch QLED 4K Smart TV
description: Brilliant colors and immersive visuals with this 4K QLED Smart TV. Powered by Tizen OS, includes voice control, HDR10+, and seamless streaming support.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Wireless Noise-Cancelling Headphones
description: Industry-leading noise cancellation with superb audio quality and 30-hour battery life. Includes touch controls, quick charge, and voice assistant support.

name: Adidas Originals Hoodie
description: This classic Adidas hoodie is made from soft fleece with a kangaroo pocket and the signature 3-stripe design. Ideal for casual or gym wear.

name: Instant Pot Duo 7-in-1 Electric Pressure Cooker
description: Multifunctional cooker that combines 7 appliances in 1: pressure cooker, slow cooker, rice cooker, steamer, sauté pan, yogurt maker, and warmer.

name: Logitech MX Master 3 Wireless Mouse
description: Ergonomic design, precision scrolling, and app-specific profiles make this the go-to mouse for developers, designers, and office power users.

name: Kindle Paperwhite (11th Gen)
description: Enjoy reading in any light with a glare-free 6.8" display and adjustable warm light. Waterproof and now with USB-C charging.

name: Levi's 501 Original Fit Jeans
description: Timeless straight-leg jeans with durable denim and a classic button-fly. Perfect for both everyday wear and more dressed-up fits.

name: HP Envy x360 2-in-1 Laptop
description: This powerful and versatile convertible laptop features a 13.3" FHD touchscreen, AMD Ryzen 7 processor, 16GB RAM, and 512GB SSD.

name: MacBook Pro 16-inch M2 Max
description: The ultimate MacBook Pro with M2 Max chip, 32GB unified memory, 1TB SSD, and 16-inch Liquid Retina XDR display. Perfect for professional workflows, video editing, and development.

name: Canon EOS R6 Mark II Mirrorless Camera
description: Professional mirrorless camera with 24.2MP full-frame sensor, 4K video recording, 12fps continuous shooting, and advanced autofocus with 1053 AF points.

name: Dyson V15 Detect Absolute Cordless Vacuum
description: Revolutionary cordless vacuum with laser dust detection, 240AW suction power, 60-minute runtime, and advanced filtration system. Includes 8 accessories for all cleaning needs.

name: Nike ZoomX Vaporfly NEXT% 2
description: Elite racing shoes with ZoomX foam, carbon fiber plate, and aerodynamic design. Used by professional runners to break world records. Lightweight and responsive.

name: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra
description: Flagship Android smartphone with 200MP camera system, S Pen integration, 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, and Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor. 5G capable with 512GB storage.

name: Breville Barista Express Espresso Machine
description: Semi-automatic espresso machine with built-in conical burr grinder, PID temperature control, and 15-bar Italian pump. Includes milk frother and tamper for café-quality coffee.

name: Apple Watch Series 8
description: Advanced health monitoring with ECG, blood oxygen, temperature sensing, and crash detection. Always-On Retina display, GPS, and cellular connectivity. 18-hour battery life.

name: Patagonia Down Sweater Jacket
description: Lightweight, packable down jacket with 800-fill-power goose down insulation. Durable water-repellent finish, zippered hand pockets, and adjustable drawcord hem.

name: DJI Mini 3 Pro Drone
description: Ultralight drone weighing under 249g with 4K/60fps video, 48MP photos, and 34-minute flight time. Includes obstacle avoidance, automated flight modes, and 12km transmission range.

name: Vitamix 5200 Blender
description: Professional-grade blender with 2.2-peak horsepower motor, 64-ounce container, and variable speed control. Perfect for smoothies, soups, nut butters, and frozen desserts.

name: ASUS ROG Strix G15 Gaming Laptop
description: Gaming laptop with AMD Ryzen 9 6900HX, NVIDIA RTX 3070 Ti, 16GB DDR5 RAM, 1TB PCIe SSD, and 15.6-inch 165Hz QHD display. RGB keyboard and advanced cooling system.

name: Bose QuietComfort 45 Headphones
description: Premium noise-cancelling headphones with 24-hour battery life, adjustable noise cancellation, and premium comfort. Includes carrying case and audio cable.

name: Lululemon Align High-Rise Pants
description: Ultra-soft, lightweight leggings with 4-way stretch and buttery-soft Nulu fabric. High-rise design with wide waistband for comfort during yoga and everyday wear.

name: KitchenAid Artisan Stand Mixer
description: Professional 5-quart stand mixer with 10-speed planetary mixing action, tilt-head design, and 325W motor. Includes flat beater, dough hook, and wire whip attachments.

name: GoPro HERO11 Black
description: Action camera with 27MP sensor, 5.3K60 video, 2.7K240 slow motion, and HyperSmooth 5.0 stabilization. Waterproof to 33ft and includes removable lens cover.

name: Nike Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG
description: Iconic basketball sneakers with premium leather upper, Air-Sole unit in midsole, and classic Wings logo. Available in multiple colorways with high-top design.

name: Sony PlayStation 5 Console
description: Next-generation gaming console with custom AMD Zen 2 processor, 4K graphics, ray tracing, and ultra-high-speed SSD. Includes DualSense wireless controller.

name: Cuisinart Food Processor
description: 14-cup food processor with 720W motor, stainless steel blades, and multiple attachments for slicing, shredding, and chopping. Includes storage case and recipe book.

name: Microsoft Surface Pro 9
description: 2-in-1 tablet and laptop with 13-inch PixelSense display, Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB RAM, and 512GB SSD. Includes Surface Pen and detachable keyboard.

name: Adidas Ultraboost 22 Running Shoes
description: Premium running shoes with responsive Boost midsole, Primeknit+ upper, and Continental rubber outsole. Energy-returning cushioning for maximum comfort during long runs.

name: Samsung 65-inch Neo QLED 8K Smart TV
description: Revolutionary 8K resolution with Quantum Matrix Technology, Neo Quantum Processor, and Object Tracking Sound. Features Infinity Screen design and Gaming Hub.

name: Ninja Foodi 9-in-1 Deluxe XL Cooker
description: Multi-functional cooker combining pressure cooker, air fryer, slow cooker, steamer, and more. 8-quart capacity with TenderCrisp technology for perfect results.

name: Apple AirPods Pro (2nd Generation)
description: Active noise cancellation with Adaptive Transparency, Personalized Spatial Audio, and sweat and water resistance. Up to 6 hours listening time with charging case.

name: The North Face Nuptse Jacket
description: Iconic down jacket with 700-fill-power goose down insulation, durable water-repellent finish, and classic box baffle construction. Available in multiple colors.

name: LG 77-inch C2 OLED Smart TV
description: Perfect blacks and infinite contrast with OLED technology, 4K resolution, and AI-powered processing. Features Game Optimizer, webOS, and voice control.

name: Dell XPS 13 Plus Laptop
description: Ultra-premium laptop with 13.4-inch 4K OLED display, Intel Core i7-1260P, 16GB LPDDR5 RAM, and 512GB PCIe SSD. InfinityEdge display and premium build quality.

name: Brooks Ghost 14 Running Shoes
description: Neutral running shoes with DNA LOFT v2 cushioning, engineered mesh upper, and segmented crash pad. Perfect for daily training and long-distance running.

name: KitchenAid Professional 600 Series Mixer
description: Professional 6-quart stand mixer with 575W motor, 10-speed planetary mixing action, and tilt-head design. Includes flat beater, dough hook, wire whip, and pouring shield.

name: Sony A7 IV Mirrorless Camera
description: Full-frame mirrorless camera with 33MP sensor, 4K60p video, 10fps continuous shooting, and advanced autofocus. Features 5-axis stabilization and dual card slots.

name: Under Armour HOVR Phantom 3
description: Running shoes with HOVR cushioning technology, engineered mesh upper, and external heel counter. Provides energy return and responsive feel for daily training.

name: Breville Smart Oven Air Fryer Pro
description: 13-in-1 countertop oven with air fryer, convection baking, slow cooking, and dehydration. 1800W power, 6-quart capacity, and 13 cooking functions.

name: Razer Blade 15 Gaming Laptop
description: Premium gaming laptop with Intel Core i7-12800H, NVIDIA RTX 3080 Ti, 32GB DDR5 RAM, 1TB SSD, and 15.6-inch QHD 240Hz display. RGB keyboard and vapor chamber cooling.

name: New Balance Fresh Foam X 1080v12
description: Neutral running shoes with Fresh Foam X midsole, engineered knit upper, and blown rubber outsole. Maximum cushioning for long-distance comfort and smooth transitions.

name: Philips Hue White and Color Ambiance Starter Kit
description: Smart lighting system with 3 A19 bulbs, bridge, and remote control. 16 million colors, voice control compatibility, and automated scheduling. Works with Alexa and Google Home.
